title: Prank Hearing, Meek Mill, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Prank Hearing, Meek Mill, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and this show is brought to you in classic radio sounding voices.  Can Tommy be pranked?  We find out today.  Meek Mill's 2008 conviction was thrown out.  Robert Mueller talks about whether a president can be charged when out of office and more.  Nicole Murphy is caught smoochin' with a married man.  Sheryl Underwood calls in to discuss her opinion about Mueller's testimony.  According to Miss Carla in Reality Update, someone from Real Housewives of Potomac is frontin'.  The owner of the Clippers loses his mind.  Today in J's What We Learned Today, we see how to fit a 25 pound show in a 5 pound bag, plus much more.  What out there now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
